text: Wow. A top-class games cafe that is a must-visit if you are in the area. Friendly boss and environment to chill with friends. Totally amazed.
Great games and friendly staff. Awesome experience!

Experience point is good place to get your fix on boardgames with their selection, there is almost games for everyone. If you are interested in Dungeon and Dragon, they do host session here as well. The owner is friendly as well and knows the stuff well. Will definitely go back often.

Cozy space with a lot of boardgame.

The owner is very friendly and helpful.

Good space for group gathering. Not too expensive (4$/person/hour), drink is 1.5$ only.

Many board games, small place. Do make a reservation beforehand. Was there from 12.50pm to 4.10pm on Sunday, $12 per person ($3 an hour) Started getting more crowded around 1+/2pm. Slightly difficult to find the location as the blocks are close together. Not original games. Players tend to take off their masks here.
